about_the_game:
Welcome to Curse of Yggdrasil, a thrilling 3D action game that promises an adventure like no other. Immerse yourself in a realm filled with ancient altars, each guarded by powerful creatures that demand your skill and courage to conquer. But beware, for underestimating your adversaries and the unforgiving environment may spell your doom. To succeed, you must analyze your foes, choose your moments to strike, dodge, or defend, and ultimately gain the upper hand in combat.

Game Features:

  • Souls-Like Combat: Engage in intense battles with a variety of moves such as attacking, dodging, blocking, parrying, and healing. Your survival depends on your mastery of these essential skills.

  • Puzzle-Solving: Embark on a journey that combines fast-paced action with moderate puzzle-solving elements. Your wit will be as crucial as your sword.

  • Character Progression: As you progress, level up your character's stats and enhance your healing abilities. Customize your playstyle to suit your preferences and the challenges that lie ahead.

  • Diverse Combat Styles: Choose from a cast of unique characters, each with their distinct combat style. Unleash devastating special attacks that can turn the tide of battle in your favor.

Story:
In the wake of a severe injury, you awaken in a strange world, surrounded by lifeless bodies bearing a striking resemblance to you. With fragmented memories and an eerie atmosphere, your only option is to confront the menacing creatures that lurk nearby. To unearth the truth behind your presence in this enigmatic realm, you must fight your way forward.
Will you conquer the curse that binds you to this world, or will you become just another lost soul?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 1700 Eight-Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Curse of Yggdrasil is a challenging souls-like game where you must overcome formidable foes to escape the dimension that holds you captive. Defeating a boss lets you absorb their soul, enabling you to incarnate them and advance, utilizing their unique abilities.
